    int
    ConcreteChair.compute(Structure structure, Card objCard)
    The method uses the cardMatrix and the wholeCells card attribute in order to identify the 3 cards which compose the chair pattern in a 2x4 matrix.
    int
    ConcreteOR.compute(Structure structure, Card objCard)
    The method gets an objective card and, by looking at the visible resources related to the specific player structure, it computes the points made satisfying that objective.
    int
    ConcreteStair.compute(Structure structure, Card objCard)
    The method uses the cardMatrix and the wholeCells card attribute in order to identify the 3 cards which compose the stair pattern in a 3x3 matrix.
    int
    Strategy.compute(Structure structure, Card objCard)
